item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description:
For a quick cheatsheet, check out https://simplemde.com/markdown-guide.

This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Note
item.description: Life is Short: How to Spend It Wisely äººç”Ÿå¾ˆçŸ­æš‚ï¼Œå¦‚ä½•åº¦è¿‡ã€‚ Today, I want to chat about something that’s been on my mind lately: time. You know, that elusive thing that seems to slip through our fingers like sand. As we grow older, our relationship with time changes. We become more aware of how quickly it passes and how nothing stays the same forever. It’s a bit of a bummer, I know, but stick with me, it’s not all doom and gloom!
